org.grouplens.lenskit.mf.funksvd

Class TrainingEstimator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.mf.funksvd.TrainingEstimator

  • public final class TrainingEstimator
extends Object

    Rating estimates used while training the predictor. An estimator can be constructed using FunkSVDUpdateRule.makeEstimator(PreferenceSnapshot).

    Since:
    1.1
